fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Consumers, Education and training, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
Revision of the Legislation governing veterinary medicinal products and medicated feed 
 
Animal Health law 
 
Training of Animal Welfare officers 
 
Dir 2013/55 Veterinary training
organisation_name: European Veterinarians in Education, Research and Industry (EVERI)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: EVERI is a section of FVE, the Federation of Veterinarians in Europe.The European Veterinary profession, embodied by FVE, strives to promote animal health, animal welfare and public health across Europe.
relevant_communication: Extramural studies for veterinary students in lab animal science, aquaculture, bee health and veterinary public health
goals__remit: EVERI's mission is to promote the health and well being of man and animals by creating a better understanding with the general public of the benefits of research, innovation and education in veterinary sciences.
